short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Seven Deadly Sins wallpaper turn new tab to HD custom Seven Deadly Sins background. Seven Deadly Sins theme for anime fans.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Seven Deadly Sins amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Seven Deadly Sins.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Sedm smrtelných hříchů mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Sedm smrtelných hříchů HD na pozadí.
short.da: Syv dødssynder Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Syv dødssynder tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Syv dødssynder fans.
short.de: Sieben tödliche Sünden Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit Sieben tödliche Sünden Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern.
short.el: Η επέκταση ταπετσαρίας Επτά θανάσιμες αμαρτίες αλλάζει νέα καρτέλα με φόντο HD ταπετσαρίας Επτά θανάσιμες αμαρτίες.
short.es: La extensión Siete pecados capitales Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo Siete pecados capitales Wallpaper HD.
short.fi: Seitsemän kuolemansyntiä Wallpaper laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Seitsemän kuolemansyntiä taustakuvan HD-taustalla.
short.fr: L'extension Sept péchés capitaux anime change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Sept péchés capitaux anime.
short.it: L'estensione I sette peccati capitali cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di I sette peccati capitali.
short.ja: 七つの大罪の壁紙拡張機能は、七つの大罪の壁紙HDの背景を持つ新しいタブページを変更します。七つの大罪ファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 일곱 가지 대죄 배경 화면 확장은 일곱 가지 대죄 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 일곱 가지 대죄 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Siedem grzechów głównych anime zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Siedem grzechów głównych anime HD.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Sete Pecados capitais muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Sete Pecados capitais.
short.sv: Sju dödssynder förlängning ändra ny flik med Sju dödssynder Anime tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Sju dödssynder-fans.
short.zh_CN: 七人传奇壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为七人传奇的背景壁纸。七人传奇粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 七人傳奇壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為七人傳奇的背景壁紙。七人傳奇粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Seven Deadly Sins wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Seven Deadly Sins background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Seven Deadly Sins new tab.
long.ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_B:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Seven Deadly Sins wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Seven Deadly Sins background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Seven Deadly Sins new tab.
